text_content: On the road Una hacienda familiare trasformata in alloggio rurale, camere semplici ma il tutto è di grande effetto. Ogni camera ha il suo bagno privato con un set di cortesia completo, wi fi gratuito. Attorno regna la tranquillità, piena campagna tra coltivazioni e cavalli. Padrona di casa gentilissima.

a lovely place to stay if driving between sevilla and cordoba, or south east a fabulous old farm house with traditional rooms, it's obviously used by locals for weddings etc., they were setting up for one when we were there, but although we were only staying one night we were treated like honoured guests. Has an outdoor pool which was open unlike most of the places we stayed at in early May

Buen hotel/hostal con una ubicación fantástica. Buen hotel/hostal con una ubicación fantástica. La ventana y el balcón daban a la catedral. También es maravilloso que el hostal/hotel esté ubicado en el centro. Conveniente para salir por la noche y volver . Отличный хостел/отель с фантастическим месторасположением. Окно и балкон выходили на кафедральный собор. так же, замечательно, что хостел/отель располагался в центре. Удобно выходить вечером и возвращаться.

Wonderful/Maravilloso We only stayed one night in Seville for a futbol match, but this place was so accommodating and the bed was extremely comfortable.  If we return, we want to stay here rather than the resort we were staying at in Marbesa!  Solo estuvimos una noche en Sevilla por un partido de fútbol, pero este lugar era muy acogedor y la cama era extremadamente cómoda. Si volvemos, queremos alojarnos aquí en lugar del resort en el que nos alojamos en Marbesa.

Perfect Hotel New hotel with good location / max. 10 minutes to the city center sights /. The room is very well furnished, well cleaned and of a good size. Breakfast is very good and rich. We had a parking space, including in the room rate  and it was very convenient because it is a problem to park in the center of Seville.  The only downside is the temperature in the breakfast room. It was too cold for me. I froze as I ate breakfast, even though I was wearing a jacket.

Très bien Une seule nuit dans cet hôtel tout neuf, extrêmement confortable et très agréable. Finalement à 10 mn du centre historique. Station de métro à 100 m. Buffet du petit déjeuner extra, personnel très aimable. Une belle découverte à noter. Les chambres sont spacieuses, la salle de bain est au top.

Great new hotel We stayed here one night as a start to our trip. Hotel is very clean with good sized room for Spain. Check in staff were very helpful. Very good selection at breakfast, the only thing I would change would be to have filter coffee as Nespresso machine takes ages. We will stay again on our next visit.

Mooi hotel. Prijs/kwaliteit is niet in verhouding  Mooie kamer. Lekker bed. Mooie badkamer. Het hotel ligt net over de brug buiten het centrum.  Is te lopen.  Wij hadden onze fietsen bij ons en waren binnen 10 minuten in het centrum.  Slecht dat de receptionistes haast geen Engels spreken. Ik had mijn eigen fiets meegenomen en vroeg waar ik deze kon parkeren.  Eerst ging ze me uitleggen waar de gym was en daarna stelde ze voor de fiets op mijn kamer te stallen(op de 7e verdieping! ). Uiteindelijk moesten we de fietsen op straat laten staan.  Kamer na 300 euro per nacht met weinig daglicht en een raam dat uitkomt in een soort schacht.  Qua prijs onacceptabel. (Zie foto's uitzicht)  Het parkeren van het hotelnis in een algemene parkeergarage. Prijs is hetzelfde.  Het enige verschil is dat je bij een automaat moet betalen in plaats…

Great hotel Beautiful room , with all ameneties. We had a room with a lovely comfortable terrace wich was very nice at the end of the evening. Really comfy bed!! Breakfast was great. Staff very nice and helpfull!  · The coffeemachines at breakfast! Only to of them and they took forever. In these days with social distancing, long ques is not what you want.

Tolles Hotel Nahe Zentrum Wir waren von unserem Hotel wirklich angenehm überrascht.  Ein tolles Hotel, super ruhig, sauber, modern, gut in Stand gehalten, tolles Personal und du Dusche ist wunderbar nach einem langen Tag in der City.   Das Bett war hervorragend und wir haben super gut geschlafen.  Zur Kathedrale sind es genau 800m - das ist ein kleiner Weg aber gut zu machen. Die Gegend ist super sicher.

Excellent Séjour touristique à Séville, la découverte de cet hôtel nous a séduit totalement par la qualité de son accueil (un plus serait parler le français), son ambiance feutrée, l'aménagement des chambres (cependant il manque de quoi prendre un café, un thé), l'extrême propreté, la qualité des équipements de la salle de bains, le lit king size, le grand écran TV.  Petit déjeuner très copieux dans une salle de restauration très agréable, bruit feutré.  De plus, possibilité de stationner dans le parking en sous sol de l'hôtel. Bref de quoi passer un excellent séjour dans cet hôtel.  Nous y reviendrons avec grand plaisir!

Fantastic value Stayed here for 4 nights,  the room was big and very modern with a super sized bed that was made for sleeping in....comfy doesn't even come close to describing it. Room was quiet and we had a balcony to relax in at the end of the day , maid service every day , fantastic stay highly recommended

Semplicemente perfetto Difficile trovare difetti a questa sistemazione: appartamento pulitissimo, curato nei dettagli (addirittura i libri antichi nel comodino), comodissimo per visitare la città a piedi. La struttura è organizzata in modo magnifico (hanno anche altre case), ci hanno contattato nei giorni prima per sapere come organizzare l’accoglienza e ci hanno lasciato i codici per entrare in casa senza addebitarci il late check-in. L’indomani la gentilissima Gema ci ha accolto e dato tutte le informazioni del caso, scrivendoci anche nelle ore successive per altri consigli utili. La dotazione della casa è decisamente superiore e rende veramente piacevole il soggiorno. Da consigliare al 100%!

Sublime penthouse et accueil chaleureux! Nous sommes venues à Séville pour 4 journées. Quand nous sommes arrivées, Martha nous a accueillies de la manière la plus chaleureuse qui soit. Elle nous a donné plein de bon conseils, de chouettes lieux à visiter. Ensuite, nous avons découvert le penthouse. Très propre, bien décoré, spacieux et surtout... une grande terrasse ensoleillée où on déjeune le matin. Le bonheur  continue pendant le séjour : nous voulions assister à un spectacle de Flamenco, et Martha a réservé un super spectacle pour nous dans les dix minutes qui ont suivi notre demande. Incroyable Martha ! Bref : c’est LE BON PLAN, allez y les yeux fermés.

Splendido soggiorno Abbiamo soggiornato 2 notti durante la Semana Santa in una camera con angolo cottura. Sistemazione ottima, gestore gentilissimo, tutto perfettamente in ordine e pulito. Zona centrale e comoda. Lo consigliamo!!!

3 giorni Siviglia Appartamento carino, mobili moderni e solarium piacevole. Peccato le pulizie che in 3 notti hanno solo rifatto il letto e pulito 1 volta. Asciugamani cambiati 1 volta e di 4 solo 3. Carini e disponibili il personale della reception e la signora delle colazioni.

Medium location, great greakfast, messy reservation process I booked through a reservation site and selected this place because it had a free cancelation policy up to 24 hours before arrival. Turns out the whole reservation process is handled by a third party business which had a different policy, and the reservation site did not state any of this. This caused some mayor issues 24 hours prior to our arrival that was fortunately solved, but did nevertheless cause a slight heart attack.   Once you arrive, the check-in has to be done online on your own device, instead of personally, the people at the desk only tell you what to do, but  cannot do the check-in themselves. There si no information of this prior to your arrival, so beware.   Rooms are quiet as they face an inner courtyard, but if you're more than 2 in a room, beware there are no doors between the sleeping room and sitting room, no privacy at all. It didn't help avoid me hearing the snoring of my friend, and thus catching any sleep at all! On the plus side, there is a capsule coffe machine, and full Andlausian breakfast waiting in the fridge with fresh bread being delivered every morning. Would only go there again if I were to stay in one of the top floor apartments with a terrace!…

SUPER PRESTATION L'hôtel est bien situé, entre Cathédrale (Santa Cruz) et Mairie de Séville (Centre Ville). Cadre moderne, escalier RdC marbre blanc et bois sur cadre inox au 1er. Au 1er, kitchenette avec micro ondes, et à disposition, des dosettes et machine à café,  thés,  bouilloires etc. Salon et salle à manger communes à dispo. Chambre vraiment bien, super nickel propre (neuve ?). Fenêtre sur arrière de la cathédrale.  Accueil exceptionnel avec : 1 shampoing, 1 savon douche et 1 lait hydratant en petits flacons. Ce n'est pas tout, spray eau de Cologne.  Et aussi 2 bloc notes Lukanda avec crayon et plan ! A se demander comment faire encore des marges ! Vraiment bien sur toutes les lignes.  Thierry et Sophie.

Indias Lofts Tolles Appartment, Küche, schöne Terasse, sauber, sehr zentral gelegen, wir würden es sofort wieder buchen. Frühstück & Essensmöglichkeiten ganz in der Nähe. Preis/Leistung sind okay. Lift vorhanden .

Idéalement situé  Réserver sue le site de Puerta Catedral. Accueil très agréable et très professionnel au 22 av de la constitution : on peut déposer les bagages avant de prendre la location à 15 h. Appartement  très spacieux situé en plein centre, avec vue sur les Archives des Indes. Très bien équipé, mais pas de lave vaisselle et wi-fi moyenne. Très bon lit dans la chambre, moins bien pour les canapés lits. Parfait pour visiter tous les sites du centre de Séville. Inconvénient : mauvaise isolation donc difficile de dormir (bruits de la place et de la terrasse du resto sous les fenêtres du loft. Service de commande de repas. Nombreux restos très près et quelques épiceries très proches (ferment à 22 h).

Superb apartment in perfect location. Bright and spacious apartment in an excellent location. Well equipped kitchen, very comfortable bed and a superb balcony with terrific view. Close to all attractions and restaurants. We will certainly be staying here on our next trip. Highly recommended.

Bad experience The place is not clean. Sheets and towels were dirty. The place smells horrible. Photos look nice on the web, but real life is different. Customer service is very poor, and provided bad excuses for the disservice. I strongly advise you to stay away!

Per me è “SI”! Posizione buona, a 10 minuti a piedi dalla Cattedrale e dall’Alcazar. Stanza piccola ma curata e pulita. Difetti? Beh...bagno separato dalla stanza da parete e porta in vetro bianco (dunque stanza illuminata a giorno in caso di utilizzo del bagno di notte) e aspiratore del bagno rumoroso e attivo per diversi minuti.  Inoltre non abbiamo mai visto nessuno alla reception (ci sono stati comunicati i codici di accesso alla struttura tramite email).

Esperienza terribile Premesso che ho eseguito il pagamento immediato un mese prima della mia vacanza, non ho mai ricevuto una mail da parte della struttura tranne che dall'hoster la conferma della mia prenotazione con relativo numero. Avviso comunque l hotel che saremmo arrivati per le h 23. Ebbene arrivati davanti all'hotel troviamo il portone chiuso, nessuna reception ed accesso con codice che noi non avevamo. Chiamo l' hotel... nessun problema... Bastava dare il numero di conferma al telefono alla receptionist. Ma sorpresa la mia prenotazione era inesistente, sparita, non risultava. Lei non poteva fare niente per noi. Ci hanno lasciato fuori dalla struttura. Nessuna indagine, nessuna telefonata da parte loro per capire cosa stava succedendo, per aiutarci in un momento drammatico. All'una di notte abbiamo trovato e pagato un altro ostello. Il giorno dopo la nostra prenotazione è ricomparsa. La stanza era a disposizione, ma non era pulita e mancavano gli asciugamani. Non ci aspettavano proprio!!!!  Chiesto ed ottenuto il rimborso per quella notte.  Sconsiglio vivamente…

Chiamo l' hotel... nessun problema... Bastava dare il numero di conferma al telefono alla receptionist. Ma sorpresa la mia prenotazione era inesistente, sparita, non risultava. Nessuna indagine, nessuna telefonata da parte loro per capire cosa stava succedendo, per aiutarci in un momento drammatico. All'una di notte abbiamo trovato e pagato un altro ostello. Avoid Hostel if you want to sleep. Very new clean hostel in centre of Malaga that just forgets one thing..looking after its guests. After 3 days of sleepless travel from Haiti I was greeted by charming Alejandro. I booked forone night but he told me I could extend the next day. I informed the cleaner I would be staying longer. As left for a coffee the next morning aggressive Cristina told me rudely I had to leave -no space.I agreed and found another hotel to check in at 4pm. Cristina took my bags and said I could wait. In one of their comfy chairs I made the mistake of falling asleep sitting upright.  Cristina very upset with that and said I could only sit with eyes open. Apparently it gives a very bad image to see someone asleep in a hostel. Maybe Cristina needs to look for a job in a Marriott.

The place offers everything you expect from a hostel but with a luxurious hotel vibe. Definitely recommend it and will be back for sure!

Didn't quite match up to expectations All new and squeaky clean. Got upgraded to a room with a view. Soundproofing is very good so little/no traffic noise. Unfortunately we had booked bed and breakfast. On arrival we had a choice of 3 breakfast times. I thought this was for Covid reasons but it isn't. It's because the breakfast room is tiny with only 9 tables so they have to stagger arrivals. Didn't like having to set my alarm for breakfast time when I'm on holiday. Also no outlook so much nicer to eat in a cafe in the old town just across the road. No phone in the room. Laptop provided but I was unable to change the language so couldn't use it. When we were troubled by noisy neighbours, reception said we could call them by laptop an dexplained how to do this. I went back to room and checked I would be able to do…

Tiny desk and no drawers We had a week in the area in October 2021 and stayed first and last night in Malaga. We are regular visitors to Malaga and thought we would try out 2 new hotels. We chose the best rooms in both. Soho boutique Equitativa and Icon Malabar. Both are great locations. Icon Malabar has a much more usable bedroom, far better breakfast and taxis can stop outside. The soho boutique is form over function and is a real pain to arrive and depart from as taxis can’t stop outside

Great Stay and great location We have just got back from a 2 day stay at this hotel and we were so happy with our choice. The hotel is new so everywhere feels so clean and new. We had a junior suite overlooking the main shopping street and the room was so spacious and light. Despite being on a main road the glass blocked out nearly all the noise. The hotel is in a perfect place with a short walk to the main area and a 20 minute walk to the beach and port.  The staff were really friendly and helpful too.

FANTASTIC    CLASSY This new boutique hotel is just fabulous opposite the main street every single staff member makes you feel so welcome everywhere is polished until it is gleaming Our room was a junior suite  amazing  breakfast which was included was not your typical buffet breakfast you were served a beautiful selection of bread eggs avocados fresh orange juice  do not stay any where else if you come to this wonderful city.PURE CLASS

Un affaccio moderno ed elegante sulla città vecchia. Abbiamo soggiornato in questa struttura una notte, in maniera da essere già a Malaga per prendere l'aereo il giorno dopo. Lo abbiamo scelto per la sua posizione che si affaccia direttamente sul centro storico, in maniera da essere vicini a tutto. L'hotel è nuovo e molto pulito (se cercate un Hotel con architettura Andalusa di sicuro non è questo.) Avevamo una camera con vista sulla strada principale dello shopping, ma nonostante questo è risultata molto silenziosa. Camera oltretutto molto spaziosa, luminosa e pulita. Personale molto bravo, ma mancante di empatia e sorriso. Costo molto elevato sproporzionato per la Spagna.

Unhelpful, unfriendly & noisy Beautiful lobby & rooms.  Unhelpful reception staff-on asking for advice on sightseeing, I was told the tourist office is around the corner.  I stayed on level 6, the pool & restaurant are on level 7 unbelievably noisy in the morning & at night

Les serveurs prennent note de votre commande mais il n’y a pas eu un jour où il ne manquait rien  Soit le jambon ibérique, soit le verre d’eau, soit les fruits bref il faut chaque fois redemander  Le dernier jour plus de yaourt et de croissant pffff Nous avions une chambre au 2ème avec terrasse et une belle vue sur la rue principale  Chambre correcte avec super douche  La piscine au 7ème par contre est minuscule…

Horrible La situation géographique de l’appartement rien à dire et la déco correspond au photos .  Mais l’appartement n’est pas insonorisé du bruit provenant des bureaux jusqu’à 22h les secrétaires que vous entendez parler en boucle dans votre appartement... Puis après les voisins douche toilettes cuisines etc ... zéro insonorisation pour des vacances horrible !!!

Schitterend appartement Wij hadden suite 3. Een zeer ruim appartement met 2 slaapkamers en een dakterras. Schitterend en van alle gemakken voorzien. Vriendelijke ontvangst. Wij waren al s ochtends vroeg aangekomen en hadden geluk dat het appartement al vrij was. We mochten er gelijk in en daar wachtte ons een verrassing : compleet ontbijt met vers brood en fruit. Wat geweldig ! We konden ook fietsen huren. In het appartement ontbrak helemaal niets, zelfs aan een strandtas met handdoeken was gedacht. Wij zouden iedereen dit appartement aanraden. Ook het centrum was heel dicht bij. De straat naar beneden aflopen, en je staat in het autovrije centrum. Dagelijks werd het appartement schoon gemaakt. Ook is er een lift aanwezig.

Agréable logement tout près du centre de Malaga Appartement bien situé (nous avons tout fait à pied), bien équipé, bon accueil et excellent service. Terrasse sur le toit bien agréable ( logement suite supérieure). Attention si vous avez besoin d’un parking : il faut réserver en même temps que le logement.

Beautiful apartment, great location We rented one of the lofts for a long weekend.  The place is in a great location in a relatively quiet neighbourhood just outside Malaga Centro.  The apartment is beautifully furnished with a huge shower, spacious living area and lovely terrace.  The “welcome pack” includes cans of pop (soda), water, bread, tea/coffee, fruit, yoghurt, cheese, eggs and more so we didn’t have to buy many supplies at all.  Staff were very friendly and the apartment was cleaned every day.  Plenty of bars and restaurants within a few minutes’ walk and the marina and beaches are 20 minutes’ walk away.

Amazing apartment near Malaga city center! My friend and I travelled to Malaga from Marbella and had the BEST stay at Graffiti Suites. The apartment was huge. We had 2 bedrooms, a bathroom stocked with Molton Brown products, a terrace with plenty of seating, a dining table, living room with 2 sofas and can't forget the full kitchen with any utensils you could need.   The kitchen was stocked with essentials such as milk, eggs, fruit and coffee which was extremely helpful! The apartment was especially clean and I loved the design! The beds and pillows were very, very comfortable.   The location was amazing - we were a 5 to 10 minute walk to the city center and all of the best restaurants and only a 15 to 20 minute drive to the airport.   All of the staff we encountered were so nice and accommodating! Mar and Leo were so very helpful with anything we needed. They had great recommendations, scheduled our covid tests for us and even went as far as printing directions for us! We wish we had more time to stay in this amazing property and will definitely be back!…

Mancano pochi dettagli per la perfezione È un appartamento in un condominio, la proprietaria Janitta ci vive con il marito e la figlia di 14 mesi, é finlandese. C’è stato un problema antipatico all’arrivo perché le istruzioni che mi aveva inviato Janitta dicevano chiaramente che il suo “numero civico” era il 9. Ho cercato per 40 minuti senza trovarlo, tante persone del posto hanno cercato di aiutarmi senza risultato. Con Janitta ci eravamo messaggiate nel corso della giornata per il mio orario di arrivo, alle 19  le avevo mandato un messaggio con previsione di arrivo alle 19.50, e a quell’ora ero nella sua strada ma lei per 40 minuti non mi ha mai risposto a telefono. Ero stanca e disperata, viaggio sola e non è facile …davvero una pessima accoglienza. Quando finalmente ha risposto mi ha detto che era impegnata con altri clienti (ma almeno rispondi!!)  Per il resto tutto ok. Casa molto bella e ben tenuta, la mia stanza era al rooftop e il letto sopraelevato nella stanza quindi potevo toccare con le mani il soffitto bollente, anche il letto sembrava avere inserito il caldoletto, quella specie di copertura elettrificata che riscalda il materasso d’inverno 😆 Non ho dato 5 punti per i seguenti motivi: due piani di scale senza ascensore si fanno sentire. Troppo caldo nella stanza, c’era un ventilatore vicino al letto e Janitta mi ha fornito una bottiglia d’acqua ghiacciata per rendere l’aria più fresca, però non è un metodo ok per il target della sistemazione. Si sente moltissimo la presenza della famiglia nei loro tempi e abitudini.  Lati positivi: sullo stesso pianerottolo c’è una terrazza con divano e tavolino piacevolissima sia di sera che di giorno. Un relax incantevole. La sistemazione è poco lontana dalla parte storica pedonale e c’è disponibilità di parcheggio libero. Pulizia della stanza top. Gentilezza top. Fatevi fare un massaggio professionale dal marito che è bravissimo (40€ ben spesi).  Consiglio l’appartamento e ci tornerei, magari in un mese meno caldo, Natale perché no… c’è già l’albero pronto nel salone.…

Ottima posizione per una bella vacanza Monolocale piccolo ma accogliente in un palazzo in pieno centro ma silenzioso e vicino al Mercato Centrale . Ma nonostante ciò è un luogo piacevole per un soggiorno e il personale è gentilissimo e un grazie a Irene per la sua disponibilità.

Appartement spacieux et bien situé mais petit dej’ à revoir Nous avons séjourné 2 nuits dans un appartement standard pour 2.  Nous avons noté comme points positifs : - La décoration de l’appartement, moderne, spacieux et fonctionnel et une literie top  - La localisation est idéale, nous avons « presque » tout pu faire à pied  - Le propriétaire était très arrangeant et sympathique  Quelques points négatifs : - Le petit déjeuner ne peut pas être réellement considéré comme une petit déjeuner : 2 croissants, et 2 bout de pain sachant qu’il n’y a rien pour accompagner le pain … le deuxième matin nous sommes allé le prendre en ville  - Problème de thermostat dans la douche, froide le premier soir et d’évacuation … de plus la douche n’était pas très pratique, rien pour poser ses affaires, pas de paroi …  Si le petit dej’ n’est pas une condition importante pour vous, nous recommandons cet endroit.…

Home away from home! TocHostel in Granada was absolutely amazing in every way. Alberto and his team went above and beyond in assisting me during my stay. Hard to beat The recently opened TOC Hostel & Suites has an excellent location in Granada historical center, just a few steps from the city Cathedral. Moreover, within walking distance, there are many restaurants and bars (by the way, the hostel itself has one, called Bueno, where breakfast is served)      At the property, everything is new and has a very nice design.  Common spaces are beautiful. For those who stay longer, there is also a fully equipped kitchen and a laundry (with washing machine and dryer)    All the members of the staff are very nice (special mention for Aida and Antonio at the reception for their kindness and all the useful information provided).  The (private) room is pretty large and comfortable. The safe is appreciated, as the hairdryer. The shower is good too. Complimentary toiletries available.     If you arrive by car, the best spot to leave it is Parking San Agustín. Paying at the hotel at check-out, the price is 19,65€ per day.   Unbeatable value for money. Very highly recommended.   …

Eccezionale! Piccolo hotel in un’ottima posizione comoda per scoprire le bellezze di Cordova. L’architettura dell’hotel è unica, moderna, mi ha ricordata lo stile di Gaudi. Le camere sono stupende, attrezzate meglio di un 5* e offrono ogni comodità e confort, il livello di pulizia è altissimo. Ho viaggiato tanto in vita mia ma non ho mai ricevuto attenzioni e servizio migliori, è stato come essere ospiti da amici di lunga data. L’anima di questo bellissimo hotel sei tu Manuel, hai reso il nostro soggiorno speciale e ringrazio ancora di tutto, spero presto di soggiornare di nuovo da te.

Relaxing and good value for money, We spent just a night in Córdoba. The hotel is just as it looks in the photos: clean lines, relaxing, excellent overall design and very clean. Location is excellent. And Manuel was very approachable, helpful and friendly. And, compared to a "regular" hotel, everything was swift, smooth and quiet. Perfect for a short stay.

Highly recommend Brand new ultra design hotel with a warm personalized welcome from the owner who took care of everything for us (monument and restaurant restaurant reservations, parking etc.). A very nice hotel and host. We highly recommend.

Superleuk boutique hotel! Wat een fantastisch boutique hotel! Tijdens onze reis door Andalusië hebben wij het genoegen gehad om 1 nacht in dit hotel te verblijven.  Kamers zijn niet groot maar van alle gemakken voorzien.  De manager stuurt via WhatsApp al informatie door en staat klaar om je met alles te helpen als dat nodig is. Zeker hier verblijven als er nog plaats vrij is!

Modern and stylish hotel in the centre of Cordoba Location is fantastic, being a stone's throw of Plaza de la Corredera. The hotel is very stylish and modern all in white. The bedroom was not very big but with everything you would need. The shower was separate from the Japanese style toilet! There is free cold water in reception and Manuel was always willing to help and provide advice on bars, restaurants and places to visit. Breakfast is included in a nearby bar and was good. Manuel walks with you to it so that everything is arranged.

Modern and minimalist white hotel Suite Generis is a modern and minimalist white hotel, originally designed and located in the historical center of Cordoba (both Plaza de las Tendillas and Plaza de la Corredera are 5 minutes distant).  Manuel, the owner and manager, is very attentive and helpful, always ready to give useful advice.   The small room is actually pretty small. If you are staying longer than 2 nights, you should better consider a different kind of room.    No hairdryer, no safe and no mini-fridge in the room (but in this last case, at the reception, you can find complimentary and cold bottles of water).  Personally, I liked the great attention that has been paid to the latest technologies too.   At the moment (sep 2021), due to the Covid-19 restrictions, breakfast is served at Casa Mari Paz, a…

A few blissful days in Cordoba Hotel Suite Generis was the most perfect place to be based in for a short visit to Cordoba. It's owners have designed a hotel that has all the modern facilities combined with the old world charm of excellent service and every comfort possible. The decor is cool in every sense of the word. It could not be more ideally located for seeing the sights of Cordoba and is near good restaurants too. Manuel is always able to make great recommendations and answer every question. I could not recommend this hotel more highly.

Ottimo! Hotel di nuova apertura. Camere molto belle, pulite e insonorizzate. Bagno molto comodo, ampio. Piscina sul terrazzo molto bella e ordinata. Personale molto preparato e cortese. Parcheggio lungo la via prospicente l'hotel (a pagamento). Supermercato a 150 mt. Bar/pasticcerie nelle vicinanze. In 15 minuti a piedi si è alla cattedrale.

Coming back, when we have the next chance Unexpectedly all round great stay.  Walking distance from old city, yet a quiet location.  Great roof terrace to cool down during the siesta.  New structure with comfy beds. Clean, great breakfast (also for vegetarians), parking in the lateral street.  Special thank you to Sergio, very attentive service and made sure we always had cold drinks while relaxing on the roof top.  Will recommend and definitely stay again when visiting.

Amazing stay We stayed at this brand new hotel for 4 nights. The premises are amazing, the cleaning standards really high. Everyone is very friendly and professional, and they go out of their way to give an incredible service. We would like to mention Francisco as the TOP man of this place: kind, accommodating & excellent customer service. Also, his brother and Sergio. Breakfast was delicious. We enjoyed the little details, such as providing antibacterial hand get to take away after eating. The swimming pool area can get a little crowded when is very warm, but it is good enough to cool you down and get you ready to go and explore Córdoba on a hot Summer day! Great stay overall, can't wait to be back :) Keep it up guys!!!

Molto buono Albergo molto buono, comunque vicino al centro e ad un prezzo davvero basso. Gli ambienti sono curati, le camere funzionali e il personale gentile. La colazione è discreta. Nelle vicinanze ci sono parcheggi a pagamento durante il giorno ma gratuiti la notte.

Super central e um hotel moderno e lindissimo Excelente localização. O quarto é lindíssimo, super moderno, limpo e funcional. O chuveiro é fabuloso, tal como a cama. O pequeno almoço não é dos mais completos mas chega perfeitamente!  Em 10 minutos a pé estamos no centro histórico da cidade, embora este hotel seja mesmo no centro. Estacionei o carro no hotel e paguei 15€.

Fab!! Stayed here for 2 wonderful nights. I’m not sure why there isn’t many reviews here (I was skeptical when I first booked it) but this little place is a gem! Looks exactly like the pictures. So beautifully restored (it is gorgeous!!), modern and clean; it looks and feel brand spanking new! I was in a studio-style room - bed (super comfy), bathroom (rain shower!), sitting area and kitchenette (there’s a microwave and nespresso machine along with some pods, which I didn’t use as I preferred my cafe bombon from the coffeehouses nearby). Had everything I needed, including fab toiletries (argan oil!). Short walk (10mins) to Mezquita and Roman Bridge, also a few minutes walk to Plaza Corredera or Plaza de la Tendillas for evening drinks and just people watching. Best wifi in all the hotels I’ve stayed in this trip. Love this place!…

Complete woning op 10 KM van Cordoba Centrum Dit appartement voorzien van alle gemakken. Woonkamer, keuken 3 slaapkamers en 2 badkamers ligt aan een meer op 10 km ten noorden van Cordoba. In de omgeving zijn verder weinig faciliteiten. 2 leuke restaurants maar geen winkels. Het huis ziet er verzorgd uit en is voorzien van zowel een vaatwasser en wasmachine. Op de site van booking.com werd vermeld dat het inclusief ontbijt was maar helaas was dit een misverstand. De eigenaar heeft het uiteindelijk ruim hoed gemaakt door ons een ontbijt bij een restaurant aan te bieden. Daarnaast heeft hij ons een zeer uitgebreid ontbijt gebracht op de laatste dag van ons vertrek. De eigenaar is heel aardig en zeer behulpzaam. Bij het huis is een gemeenschappelijk zwembad. Het zwembad ligt te midden van de huizen en is per auto te bereiken, het heeft een goede parkeergelegenheid. Bij het zwembad zijn geen ligbedjes, wij hebben stoeltjes van het huis meegenomen.…

Eccezionale! Piccolo hotel in un’ottima posizione comoda per scoprire le bellezze di Cordova. L’architettura dell’hotel è unica, moderna, mi ha ricordata lo stile di Gaudi. Le camere sono stupende, attrezzate meglio di un 5* e offrono ogni comodità e confort, il livello di pulizia è altissimo. Ho viaggiato tanto in vita mia ma non ho mai ricevuto attenzioni e servizio migliori, è stato come essere ospiti da amici di lunga data. L’anima di questo bellissimo hotel sei tu Manuel, hai reso il nostro soggiorno speciale e ringrazio ancora di tutto, spero presto di soggiornare di nuovo da te.

Хорошее настроение. Были мы на машине, близлежащие парковки были битком. У апартаментов есть платная парковка. В этот день был какой то мото праздник...Но в метрах 200 нашли бесплатную парковку. Удобное расположение апартаментов. Отличный хозяин !Общительный, добродушный. По звонку сразу приехал .Мы не знали точного времени приезда, дорога есть дорога, плюс при въезде часть улицы была перекрыта из за праздника и мы начали блуждать . Поднял нам настроение после долгих блужданий по городу. Расположение апартаментов супер! Есть терраса с шикарным видом. Квартира удобная, интерьер лаконичный, была кухня.  Есть лифт. Во внутреннем дворике есть небольшой бассейн. Хороший wi-fi. Небольшое пожелание, добавить какую ни будь табличку на дом. Проще будет искать с улицы т и на машине.

Bella ed efficiente struttura Struttura impeccabile. Appena sistemato, Curro ci ha prontamente avvertito così che alle 12:30 avevamo preso possesso dell'appartamento che si raggiunge in 5 minuti a piedi dalla Moschea.…

Très bien situé et très bien agencé Ce bâtiment possède trois appartements donnant sur une très jolie cour intérieure typique des maisons andalouses, colorée et ornée de nombreuses plantes. Notre appartement possédait tout le nécessaire pour un séjour prolongé (cuisine équipée avec couverts et ustensiles de cuisine, frigo, machine à laver, bouilloire, cafetière, etc.) et même davantage, avec la télévision et une petite cour intérieure entre la chambre/salon et la cuisine. L'un des propriétaires, jeune et très sympathique, passait tous les jours en milieu de journée (au cas où). L'appartement est parfaitement situé dans le cœur de ville, à la fois très proche de tous les monuments (tout est accessible à pied) et un peu à l'écart des rues les plus passantes. Le prix pratiqué m'a semblé faible par rapport à la qualité proposée.…

Fantastic, can't wait to go again!! Had an unbelieveable holiday.  Location is superb and the views are amazing.  Rooms were spacious, clean and modern with air conditioning, flat screen TV's and ensuite.  The hotel is run by a lovely English couple who made our holiday unforgettable.  The food was lovely with great choice at a very reasonable price.  Overall this is the best holiday we have ever had, activities were brilliant, we were very well looked after and we can't wait to return next year!

An ideal place to relax and get away from the normal package holiday and visit the real Spain. First class surroundings and service. Rooms had air conditioning and flat-screen TVs, they were well furnished with on-suite and we even had a small balcony with a fantastic view of the surrounding countryside. The food was excellent with a selection of British, Spanish, Italian and French menus, all cook to a high standard and I felt well priced. The Hotel was family owned and ran by an English couple who made our stay that little bit special, their attention to detail and personal service is something you would not receive at a larger hotel. Facilities were excellent with two teenage boys the outdoor activity were exactly what they were looking for and with beautiful surrounding an ideal place to relax.

Adventure Velez Having recently returned from a holiday at Adventure Velez near a lovely town called Velez Rubio I feel I have to let people know this is one to give a MISS. We spent between us including flights and car hire £1,520 for three people for 1 week and the atmosphere was unbearable. We had no television no phone no air conditioning with temperatures exceeding 35 degrees. The owners told us we had been given an upgrade because we were the only people there. We never had a change of bedding and we had 1  towel change. There was zero customer service, the food was minimal and no choice of menu. The best meal we had was when some locals visited for a meal and they raised the standard. So for the 18 euros we paid for an evening meal this was the only night it was worth it having been told by locals that we could have a 3 course meal at a top Hotel for 15 euros we feel again this was over the top. Exploring the area was eceptional having visited some beautiful part of Almeria this was down to my own knowledge of the area and locals advise.…

Disappointed Unfortunately this campsite was not for us. Too isolated, no nice views (huge plastic covered growing plantation in view) and not near the beach and restaurants as expected. The large pitches were an excellent size and perfect for our 8.5 metre motorhome. The lady on reception was very helpful and pleasant and the facilities were spotless. The picture of the pool area does not represent the true views around the park.

Camping at Cabo de Gato Received a friendly but efficient welcome, helpful staff and well stocked shop. Very nice pool with disability apparatus. and even though out of season the bar was open and served a deliciously different salad and a stunning fish platter with very reasonable charge. The facilities were immaculately clean and we were upgraded to a very good pitch. Highly recommended.

Scary, dirty & non-welcoming! My friend and I stayed at Mi Luna for one night.  To spite the description, the place was very dirty; many things did not work; and there were a total of 16 people squeezed into an approximately 800 foot place.  While there, we were asked to continuously whisper, as their yoga studio was above and beyond their priority over their massive amount of guests.  In the morning, my friend and I were talking in our room at a normal volume, when the half-naked male host barged into our female room without being invited!  He proceeded to yell at us about how we were not being quiet enough.  When we pointed out that we felt unsafe and unwelcomed, the man picked up our belongings and demanded that we leave!

Peace and Tranquility in the Mountains Beautiful, quiet and relaxing are just 3 words that discribe our stay at Villa Janian.  A perfect double room set in the villas grounds overlooking the peaceful village of Lijar.  The room was spotlessly clean with modern furnishings and a bed that you will not want to get out of. Our host Janet and Ian offered a full cooked breakfast or continental or just jucie and cereral. And guess what you decide when you want it. Perfect for my wife and I who like too lie in when on holiday.  Lijar is a very small village so don't expect shops and restraurants, but we spent 3 great evenings in the local bar/restaurant with some great people and good food. The fridge in the room was already stocked with beer, juice and water. Coffee anf tea in the room also. Ian has a well stocked pool bar that you can axcess any time - just leave your Euros in the tin! So if you want a relaxing break you know where to go.…

as previous reviewer - BEST B & B IN ALMERIA! A get away from in all peaceful holiday, ideal for couples - the accomodation could not be better, 5 star.   The pool and surroundings are fantastic, with a wonderful welcome from hosts Ian and Janet, assisted by Ben.   Janet is a wonderful cook and nothing is too much trouble.   An ideal place to wind down.   The surrounding countryside has wonderful walks and the village has a lovely Restuaurant and quaint typically Spanish Bars.   All in All Brill!   Well recommended.

Best B&B in the Southern Spain Cracking little B&B just outside the picturesque little village of Lijar, an hour inland from Almeria. Delightful and peaceful, off the beaten track. Great room, great views, great breakfasts. English hosts Ian and Janet (plus Ben) couldn't do enough for us. Will be coming back next year when the real world gets too much and we need to escape!

Our host Janet and Ian offered a full cooked breakfast or continental or just jucie and cereral. And guess what you decide when you want it. Perfect for my wife and I who like too lie in when on holiday.  Lijar is a very small village so don't expect shops and restraurants, but we spent 3 great evenings in the local bar/restaurant with some great people and good food. The fridge in the room was already stocked with beer, juice and water. Coffee anf tea in the room also. Ian has a well stocked pool bar that you can axcess any time - just leave your Euros in the tin! So if you want a relaxing break you know where to go.…

Good hotel in an amazing place We were on a lynx wildlife trip and this accommodation was part of the package. It is situated in the middle of the Sierra du Andujar N.P. The owner and staff were very welcoming, the food was very good and so much of it. Packed lunches are available on request. Although there were no children in our group the accommodation blocks would be very good for families, with three bedrooms and two bathrooms. We had a bedroom, lounge and kitchenette. Swimming pool for summer visits. Gardens were well planted attracting bird life. We had a bush with 17 siskins. During our time in the park we saw over 104 species of birds, 12 species of mammal including four sightings of the lynx.

Back to nature in unspoiled Andalucia We chanced on this lovely B&B almost by accident after our house purchase fell through.  We couldn't have found a better place to recover from our disappointment and exhaustion.  Casa de Vides is situated in a tiny village near Alcala la Real in the Province of Jaen.  If you're loking for the "real Spain" of legend then you'll surely find it here!  The owners, Brian and Sandra welcomed us with open arms into their beautiful home making us feel like friends not paying guests.  We were also warmly welcomed by the villagers  who invited us into their homes and out to the  campo with them: within days we were absorbed into the the community.    The rooms are very comfortable and the whole house has a very traditionally Spanish feel to it.  Sandra's cooking is becoming a local legend with much of the produce coming from her garden.  An interesting exchange of recipes and cooking skills with the local ladies means that one day you can be eating a delicious local Spanish dish and the next a curry!  The views of the mountains and the olive groves from the village are staggering, and if you can tear yourself away from the peace and quiet of the house and swimming pool, then you'll find Granada, Jaen, Cordoba, Alcala la Real and the forgotten gem that is Priego de Cordoba all within an easy drive.  All around the area are wonderful walks and Brian is only to happy to help and advise on the best areas.  You'll be spoiled for choice.  If you want to relax and enjoy wonderful scenery and walks, great company, superb food, with some of Spain's most stunning cities within reach, then this is undoubtedly the place for you.  Give Brian and Sandra a ring and have a chat and like us, you'll certainly not regret it!   By the way we'll be going back again this year.…
